messages.text: About the cruelty we were talking about â€” I grew up mostly in Ramla, and if there's one thing I was always exposed to, it's how merciless Muslims can be
Like dog fights where you could see the enjoyment in their eyes
Or Mohammed putting on a show for the neighborhood kids by chopping pigeons' heads off or sticking firecrackers in them, lighting and letting go. I was 7.
A childhood memory that's stuck with me ever since
